channel.title: Mass Effect 2 to be Released on PS3
channel.description:
[quote="USA News"] PlayStation 3 owners will finally get the chance to experience the adventures of Commander Shepard and the crew of the Normandy.
During Electronic Arts' press conference at Gamescom 2010 in Germany, BioWare revealed Mass Effect 2 will be available on PS3 in January 2011.
The second chapter in the intergalactic sci-fi series features Shepard working for the organization Cerberus to wipe out a potential threat to making. To tackle this threat, Shepard must assemble a crew of assassins, soldiers, and other characters for a potential suicide mission.
Mass Effect 2, which released in January for PC and Xbox 360 is one of the year's best titles, weaving stellar storytelling with an overhauled combat system. Head here for more details on Mass Effect 2.
For those wondering whether the first Mass Effect will appear on PS3, keep in mind the first game was published by Microsoft, home to the rival Xbox 360 [/quote] Poor Xbox.

item.description:
SoaringScout:

Who cares?

If you’re going to “meh,” then go “meh.” Apathy stops being apathy when you start making backhanded additions.

item.title: Mass Effect 2 to be Released on PS3
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Medevilae:

Poor Xbox.

How so? I see nothing in your quote about the PS3 version getting anything exclusive. If anything, the PS3 version is gimped because you can’t load up a save from the first game. (unless they find a way around that, which is entirely possible)

It’s good that they’re letting more people experience it, but I’ll still probably get ME3 on my 360.

Katana:

Why the delay if it used Unreal Engine 3?

License. Pretty much the same thing as the GTA4 DLC, or any other game that is up and running on all systems, yet has staggered release dates for no real reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Mass Effect 2 to be Released on PS3
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
This is cool, i got the first and second on xbox 360, second is collectors very nice, not to bothered about it being on console, as the game has no sdk kit so no 3rd party mods. no loss, maybe just a few finer graphics but they were still awesome on 360, itd be nice for ps3 players to have a taste of it.
